department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Agricultural machinery for planting and seeding
description: PWGSC, on behalf of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada, is issuing this request for proposal (RFP) for the acquisition of a 4-row seeder for intercropping cover crops including delivery and the operations and maintenance manual, located in Saint-Augustin-de-Desmaures, Quebec, Canada, as detailed in Annex Statement of Requirement. See the following link:
duration_in_months: If award of contract will take place before April 2024, the estimated contract duration is 2 months
